document_data.name: Thold Ramaeras
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite dragon/293/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: The Missing Minotaur|75}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Thold Ramaeras''' was a trader in fine [[wine]]s in the town of [[Everlund]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]]. He was also a member of the [[Arcane Brotherhood]].
document_data.Description: Thold was always smiling. He had dark [[amber]] eyes, dark hair, and a handsome face. He was slender, but knew how to handle a weapon.
document_data.Activities: Ramaeras could sometimes be found in the [[Missing Minotaur]] tavern, a rough and rowdy establishment on the west side of Everlund. He was a wine merchant that did business around Everlund. This allowed him to perform services for the Arcane Brotherhood as well as gather information. He frequently sponsored young adventuring bands to explore sites in which he was interested, requiring them to report back to him on what they discovered.
